channel.title: 彭博-市场

item.title: 由于住房危机导致家庭财富缩水，习近平摒弃了大范围刺激经济的老套路，此举正引发不满。
item.description:
Xi Jinping's move to shun the old playbook of unleashing broad stimulus is spurring discontent, as a housing crisis cuts into household wealth. https://t.co/pbO5vrYBPZ

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 比特币反弹至 60,000 美元以上，令加密货币行业重现乐观情绪，但香港及香港以外地区的监管审查可能会继续进行。
item.description:
Bitcoin's rally above $60,000 is renewing optimism in the crypto industry, yet regulatory scrutiny is likely to continue in Hong Kong and beyond https://t.co/v81kbStwiU

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 巴西希望亿万富翁在全球消除贫困的斗争中付出更多。为了推销这个想法，巴西请来了一位法国经济学家，他因追踪全球超级富豪的藏钱之地而闻名。
item.description:
Brazil wants billionaires to pay more in the global fight against poverty. To sell the idea, it’s enlisting a French economist famous for tracking down where the world’s ultra-rich hide their money. https://t.co/4lSJ01Oaym

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: "在其他视频游戏公司裁员之际，《侠盗猎车手》制造商摇滚明星游戏公司（Rockstar Games）召集员工每周五天返回办公室。
item.description:
"Grand Theft Auto" maker Rockstar Games has summoned staff back to the office five days a week as other video games companies cut staff.@edludlow has more https://t.co/yZO1XZk6vA pic.twitter.com/B7JVRuNoDG

item.title: 据一位负责货币政策的前执行董事称，日本央行可能会等到 4 月份才会终止全球最后一次负利率政策
item.description:
The BOJ will likely wait until April before terminating the world’s last negative interest rate, according to a former executive director in charge of monetary policy https://t.co/DdnogzHgU7

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 由于在加沙和乌克兰问题上存在分歧，二十国集团（G20）财政部长将在未就闭幕公报达成一致的情况下结束圣保罗会议
item.description:
The G-20 finance chiefs are set to end their meeting in Sao Paulo without agreement on a closing communique, amid divisions over Gaza and Ukraine https://t.co/wZbEAJi0aD

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 根据 CoreLogic NZ 的数据，2 月份新西兰住房市场延续了今年开局的疲软态势，价格涨幅连续第二个月放缓。
item.description:
New Zealand’s housing market continued its soft start to the year in February, with price gains slowing for a second straight month, according to CoreLogic NZ. https://t.co/rU2SiBaaHA

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 众议院通过临时拨款法案以避免美国政府周六部分关门，并将该法案送交参议院

item.title: 据美国能源信息署（Energy Information Administration）称，美国的石油需求在 2023 年飙升至四年来的最高点，预计到 2024 年将保持在这一水平附近。
item.description:
Oil demand in the US surged to a four-year high in 2023 and is expected to hold near that level through 2024, according to the Energy Information Administration https://t.co/5AjemjiBLN

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 葡萄牙财政部长费尔南多-梅迪纳敦促欧洲央行开始降低借贷成本，称将借贷成本维持在当前水平是一种 "高风险"。
item.description:
Portuguese Finance Minister Fernando Medina urges the ECB to start lowering borrowing costs, saying maintaining them at their current level is a “high risk” https://t.co/y9uU59D1kk

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 澳大利亚房价在 2 月份加速上涨，在利率高企的情况下扩大了涨幅，反映了人口增长的激增和新住房建设的匮乏。
item.description:
Australian home prices accelerated in February, extending gains at a time of elevated interest rates, reflecting a spike in population growth and a dearth of new housing construction. https://t.co/GTwpc6cRmT

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 战神管理公司（Ares Management）与总部位于悉尼的 Pallas Capital 合作成立了一个 5 亿澳元的基金，为缺乏银行资金的商业地产公司提供流动资金。
item.description:
Ares Management has teamed up with Sydney-based Pallas Capital for an A$500 million fund that will provide liquidity to commercial real estate firms who lack bank funding. https://t.co/1BeLYUoNIs

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 银河数字公司（Galaxy Digital）创始人迈克-诺沃格拉茨（Mike Novogratz）告诫投资者，比特币可能会出现一些调整，然后再创历史新高，并在年底 "大幅上涨"。
